overview: Tomm needs some help lifting and moving heavy bricks. He soon finds out just exactly how good his helper is with his hands.  Luke comes home from a long hard day at work. When Chris sees him in his uniform Luke's day isn't the only thing that's long and hard!  When Paul gets up to go to work, he look so good in his police uniform that Karl begs him to come back to bed. Paul complies and the action heats up fast.  Dick is a military man and he has the hot body to show for it. Once Peter see's how hot he looks in his uniform, Peter is ready for some action!
title: Men In Uniform 4
